Name: Minimalism
About the game: Minimalism - platformer with a lot of levels, made in minimalist style - which is a cube protogonist. The game is a kind of labyrinth consisting of levels, to go between them you need to open the doors with collected keys. Features: - 30 increasing complexity as you progress through levels - Minimalistic design - Good music
